channel.title: History on R-Ladies Global
channel.description: Recent content in History on R-Ladies Global

item.title: History
item.description: R-Ladies was founded by Gabriela de Queiroz. She wanted to do something to give back to the R learning community after going to several meetups and learning a lot for free. The first meetup took place in San Francisco, California (United States) on October 1, 2012.
